LocaleLayout.description: Personal travel recommendations from Flav & Jade, your local friends in Gozo

OurStory.title: Hi, we're Flav & Jade
OurStory.paragraph1: We're a French-South African couple who fell in love with Gozo 3 years ago. What started as a vacation turned into a new life on this magical island.
OurStory.paragraph2: Living here has given us the privilege of discovering incredible places and meeting amazing people. From secret swimming spots to family-run restaurants that don't even have signs, we've explored every corner of Gozo.
OurStory.paragraph3: This website is our personal travel journal - a collection of our favorite discoveries organized into categories that reflect how we experience the island. Each recommendation comes with a story, because we believe the best travels are about connections, not just destinations.
OurStory.quote: We don't just recommend places, we share the ones that have become part of our story
